alldb.table_sql: select *from ( SELECT P.ID Id, p.doc_id as docid, nvl( p.save_status,' ') as savestatus, P.EQUIP_NAME AS EQUIPNAME, P.MODEL_ AS MODEL, P.EQUIP_NUM AS EQUIPNUM, P.PRICE AS PRICE, P.EQUIP_PRICE AS EQUIPPRICE, P.TOTAL, P.UNIT, P.NOWTOTAL, P.BRAND_ AS BRAND, P.VNDR AS VNDR, CI3.CUST_NAME AS VNDRNAME, P.MANUFACTURER AS MANUFACTURER, CI2.CUST_NAME AS MANUFACTURERNAME, P.DEVICE_TYPE AS DEVICETYPE, DICT.NAME_ AS DEVICETYPENAME, P.EQUIP_DELIVERY_PLACE AS EQUIPDELIVERYPLACE, P.EQUIP_DELIVERY_DATE AS EQUIPDELIVERYDATE, P.EQUIP_PLACE AS EQUIPPLACE, P.CENOTE AS CENOTE, p.equip_id AS EQUIPID, p.contract_id as contractid, P.VNDR_TYPE AS VNDRTYPE, DICT1.NAME_ AS VNDRTYPENAME FROM CONTRACT_EQUIP_TMP P LEFT JOIN CUST_INFO CI2 ON P.MANUFACTURER = CI2.ID LEFT JOIN CUST_INFO CI3 ON P.VNDR = CI3.ID LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT ON P.DEVICE_TYPE = DICT.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT1 ON P.VNDR_TYPE = DICT1.ID_ ) P WHERE 1=1 and savestatus !='删除' /~conid: AND contractid='{conid}' ~/ /~docid: AND docid='{docid}' ~/
